That's right, copy 
http://www.angelfire.com/scifi/decepticonempire/rpersmain.html and paste and 
you'll be there.  Be patient when you load people's invidual profiles, they 
may have midis/pictures and may take a sec to load.  Hopefully more people 
will get brave and send in some profiles.


-L. Unitron
